俺たちシリウスシュガーは、カオスメイデンとの\n公式戦当日を迎えた。:
We Sirius Sugaru, with Chaos Maiden.
The day of the official match arrived.
競技会場となるシティの市街地は異様な盛り上がりを見せている。: The urban area of the city where the competition is taking place is filled with a strange excitement.
屋台まで出てるじゃないか。いつもこんなお祭り騒ぎなのか？: There's even a food stall here. Is there always this kind of festival going on?
学園都市の住人にとっては、そのようなものですわ。: That's how it is for the residents of Academy City.
市街地で行われるＭＧ競技はここの名物だからねぇ。: MG competitions held in the city are a specialty of this place, after all.
すぐ近くで実弾が飛びかうってのにか？\n危険意識とかどうなってるんだよ。:
Even though live bullets are going to fly nearby?
What's going on with her sense of danger?
模擬戦と同じで競技用の武装を使うから大丈夫だよ。: Just like in the mock battles, we'll be using competitive armaments, so don't worry.
一応、流れ弾で建物に損害が出たとしても、学園の予算で\n保障されるので地域住民に:
Just in case a stray bullet caused damage to the building, the academy’s budget would cover it
It's a system that doesn't burden the local residents because it's guaranteed.
価値？一体、何のことだ？: Worth? What the hell are you talking about?
そう思い白奈が指した方を見てみると、\n模擬戦のオッズが表示されていた。:
Thinking that, I looked in the direction Shirona was pointing.
It displayed the odds of a mock battle.
……って、賭博じゃねえか！ 観光客まで混ざって何やってるんだよ！: ...Wait, that's a gamble! What the hell are you doing, mixing in tourists?!
（しかもオッズはカオスメイデンの勝利が１.１倍。\nシリウスシュガーの勝利はなん:
(Furthermore, the odds are 1.1 times higher for Chaos Maiden.)
Sirius Sugaru's victory is 22 times greater...)
（こんなオッズが出るなんて、とんでもないな）: (I can't believe such odds came out.)
誰も俺達の勝利を信じていないってことか。\nあれを覆すのが挑戦者の醍醐味ってやつ:
Does that mean nobody believes in our victory?
Overturning that is the best part of being a challenger.
『あの時、誰も信じなかった勝利をシリウスシュガーは手にした』\nそう語られる伝説:
“Back then, Sirius Sugaru obtained a victory no one believed in.”
Let's make it a legendary day, shall we?
それっぽいことを言いながら財布を取り出してるとこ悪いですが、\n学園生徒はベット:
I'm sorry to say that while taking out my wallet, but...
School students can't bet, you know?
……そいつは残念だ。万が一負けても悔しくないように、\nカオスメイデンに賭けよう:
...That's too bad. Just in case I lose, I won't regret it.
I was going to bet on Chaos Maiden.
……負けたら居場所なくなる。: ...If I lose, I won't have a place to belong.
まったく、冗談だよ冗談。\n大体、俺はもうお前らの勝ちに賭けてるんだからな。:
Seriously, I'm just kidding.
Besides, I'm already betting on your victory.
大丈夫。絶対勝てる。ってか、勝たないと俺もヤバいんだ。\nなにがなんでも勝ってこ:
Don't worry. I'll definitely win. Actually, if I don't win, I'm in trouble too.
No matter what, go win.
心配しなくてもおまえの財布、\n祝勝会でラミ達がすっからかんにしてあげるから！:
Don't worry, your wallet,
Rami and the others will make you feel better at the victory celebration!
事前情報によると、シリウスシュガーが模擬戦で\nカラフルブーケに対して好成績を残:
According to the advance information, Sirius Sugaru was in a mock battle
He left a good mark on the colorful bouquet.
へえ、解散寸前のチームが柊のエースに？: Huh, so the team on the verge of disbanding is Hiiragi's ace?
あの指揮官のおかげじゃない？ 楽しみだな～！\nなんか策があるって言ってたし！:
Isn't it thanks to that commander? I'm looking forward to it!
He said he had a plan!
そうですね。何かしらの策を仕掛けてくるのは確実でしょう。: That's right. They'll definitely come up with some kind of plan.
ですから、あえてつけ込む隙のない定石的な戦法……: That's why there's no openings to take advantage of...
つまり、正面から受けて立つのが最適だと思います。: In other words, I think it would be best to take it head-on.
まずは試合開始直後に、緊要地形であるビル群を拠点として占領。\nどこから接近され:
First, right after the match began, they occupied the tense terrain of the buildings as their base.
I think we should form a formation so that we can intercept them no matter where they approach us.
無難というか、固い作戦ですね。: It's more like a solid plan than a safe one.
んー。よくわかんないけど、なんか私達っぽくなくない？: Hmm. I don't really get it, but isn't it kind of like us?
はい。相手はカオスメイデンを倒す策を用意してきているはずです。: Yes. The enemy should have prepared a plan to defeat Chaos Maiden.
ですから、あえていつもと違う作戦を取れば\n相手にとって想定外となるでしょう。:
So, if you take a different strategy than usual
It will be unexpected for the other party.
くすっ、カオスメイデンらしさを外すのが、\n今回のあたし達らしさってことね……:
Teehee, getting rid of Chaos Maiden’s personality...
It's just like us this time...
なんとなくわかった！ 任せて！: I think I get it! Leave it to me!
それでシリウスシュガーに勝って、あの人を私達の指揮官にする！: Then we'll beat Sirius Sugaru and make him our commander!
待っててね……！ %usernameusernameuserna%！: Wait for me...! %user name, username, user name, %!
そして、生徒会長による開会の言葉と、\nルールの説明が始まった。:
And then there was the opening speech from the student council president.
The explanation of the rules began.
皆様方、本日はお集まりいただき誠にありがとうございます。\n競技を開始する前に、:
Everyone, thank you very much for gathering here today.
Before we begin the competition, let's go over the rules again.
今回の試合は、５対５の殲滅戦となっています。: This match is a five-on-five extermination battle.
なお、シリウスシュガーには特殊ルールとして、\n生徒会から派遣した指揮官機が参加:
Incidentally, Sirius Sugaru had special rules
The student council has dispatched a command plane to participate.
この指揮官機は文字通り、指揮のみを行うため、\n一切の兵装を装備していません。:
This command plane is literally meant to be commanded only
Not equipped at all.
（いや、これホントに何も装備ないんだよな……\nせめて小銃のひとつぐらいあっても:
(No, this really doesn't have any equipment...)
At the very least, it should be fine to have a rifle.)
指揮官機は殲滅戦のカウントの対象外となりますので、\n他の５機が落とされた時点で:
Commander planes will be excluded from the count of annihilation battles.
The moment the other five are dropped, Sirius Sugaru will lose.
ただし、指揮官機を撃墜しても問題はありません。\n指示系統を先に潰すのは戦闘の定:
However, there is no problem with shooting down the Commander's aircraft.
Crushing the chain of command first is a standard tactic in battle, after all.
（せっかく無事でいられそうだったのに、\n余計なことを言わないでくれよ……）:
(It looked like she was finally safe, but...)
Please don't say anything unnecessary...)
ルール説明は以上となります。: That concludes the explanation of the rules.
すでに双方準備が出来ているようですので、早速試合を開始しましょう。: It looks like both sides are ready, so let's begin the match right away.
悔いの残らない試合になるよう、双方全力を尽くすように。\nそれでは――試合開始で:
Both sides were going to do everything they could to ensure that this match wouldn't leave any regrets behind.
Now then... Let the match begin!
生徒会長の号令と共に、シリウスシュガーとカオスメイデン両方の\n機体が動き始める:
At the student council president’s command, both Sirius Sugaru and Chaos Maiden
The aircraft began to move.
いくぞ、みんな……！ ジャイアントキリングの時間だ！: Let's go, everyone...! It's time for the Giant Killing!
ふふ、言ってみたかったんです。: Hehe, I wanted to say it.
だって、ある意味わたくし達を結びつけた言葉ですから。: After all, in a way, those are the words that brought us together.
付随する思い出はえげつないものばっかだけどね。: The memories that come with it are all vulgar, though.
でも不思議と悪い気はしない。: But strangely, I don't feel bad about it.
ああ！ 勝とう！！ 俺はお前らが絶対勝つと信じている！！: Yeah! Let's win!! I believe you guys will definitely win!!
